paper_abstract: We propose a simple scheme for teleporting an unknown state in a probabilistic and controlled manner via linear optical elements using a tripartite entangled GHZ state. By using a Mach-Zehnder interferometer, we realize all teleportation processes by only single-qubit measurements; thus our scheme is readily realizable within current technology.
paper_title: Probabilistic and controlled teleportation of unknown ionic states via linear optical elements
